page.title: 05GOLDERS GREEN AREA
page.content: In Golders Green the people are{multi- {cultural}(some of them are visitors). There are also foreign things and food for the people from the different countries. The{many restaurants}are from all over the world. There are also{synagogues, temples, churches and {other places of worship. The main shopping street is Golders Green Road which has shops, super- markets, newsagents, chemists and a cinema. Because of all the shops some people sometimes don't get a proper parking space so they have to park in a different part of Golders Green. The houses in the side streets have {big gardens}for children to play so that they don't have to play on the streets. Some roads are very quiet and the houses have{Neighbourhood Watch stickers on the door so that bad people will not rob the houses.
